amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 as en bloc No. 4: Nos. 60, 61, 85, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, and 104.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 60, 61, 85, 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, and 104, printed in Part A of House Report 118-147.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendments Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 57 (Roll no. 361).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A028) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
